verbs.description: [V: smash] [ARG1: a tv] relieve stress patrons pay to break stuff at rage rooms in chicago across the country rage rooms are emerging across the country where customers pay to smash household objects to alleviate stress it a catharsis says the owner of rage room in chicago yet some mental health experts caution the method might do more harm than good school teacher marie musil chicago
